sentences.sContent: She stole out of the house at midnight.
sentences.sCn: 她在半夜悄悄离开了家。

sentences.sContent: They started off to Normandie at midnight.
sentences.sCn: 他们在午夜踏上了开赴诺曼底的征程。

sentences.sContent: They arrived in Beijing at midnight and checked into Beijing Hotel.
sentences.sCn: 他们于午夜抵达北京并登记住进北京饭店。
